title: Patch 6.20 in a nutshell
body:
{{champion:427}} 
There once was a tree named Ivern, 
He doesn't kill gromps, krugs, or wyverns.
But i have got to say,
He looks very gay,
That means he must be fun to play!

{{champion:22}} 
But now we get, to the idea of frost,
Its getting much stronger, but time it had, is lost.

{{champion:222}} 
Oh look in your lap!
She's thrown you a trap!
But worry no more, 
the damage aint longer a score!
But still, you will, be hurt.

{{champion:20}} 
Now here we present,
A new slowing percent!
An ulti that wont let you move!

{{champion:8}} 
Well look at this count,
His new healing amount,
will turn the tides of your war!

But here is what,
the post really is for, 
The news, about, new skins!

{{champion:78}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:222}} 
Flying onto the rift, our galactic protectors, 
2 yordles, and signature collectors, 
Just like in our dreams, 
Riot made all of our weeb memes,
A reality we'll fight for once more.

replies.body: http://i.imgur.com/go6LfeA.jpg
but art has 3 letters jhin.
Jhin spells it the artistic way, "arte"
*arté
no "ART!", the ! is the character that gives it the emphasis
emph asis
you put the emph asis on the wrong sy laable
i was making a four joke
Just know that your word line will gain some good luck from many kids, plus give glad head song.
...u wot? What language do you think you're speaking?
Some1 managed to keep the oh-so-pro paint work I did for Jhin release! :D
Upvote for the Rhymes

{{champion:432}} collects its chimes
{{champion:26}} and {{champion:245}} keep their times
(keep it going)

{{champion:13}} still believing it's the end times
{{champion:4}} 's passive giving him dimes
{{champion:41}} won't pay for his crimes
{{champion:420}} dated him in his prime
{{champion:41}} Oranges are better than limes!
{{champion:26}} The guy who's never out of time.
{{champion:421}} -Furious clicking noises-
{{champion:432}} -Random musical notes-

{{champion:86}} DEMACIAAAAA!
